snippet: To the Editor:    In your July 27 front-page profile of Ward Connerly, the nation's most active opponent of racial preferences, Mr. Connerly cites my research to support his stand against affirmative action -- a stand that I oppose....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In your July 27 front-page profile of Ward Connerly, the nation's most active opponent of racial preferences, Mr. Connerly cites my research to support his stand against affirmative action -- a stand that I oppose.
abstract: Prof Claude M Steele letter on July 27 profile of Ward Connerly, opponent of affirmative action; corrects Connerly's statement that Steele believes black college students are overwhelmed by self-doubts (S)

headline.main: Student Self-Doubts Are No Reason to End Minority Preferences
